mapper.select: SELECT T.* FROM paper as P JOIN teacher as T ON P.Paper_researchOne = T.Teacher_researchOne OR P.Paper_researchOne = T.Teacher_researchTwo OR P.Paper_researchOne = T.Teacher_researchThree OR P.Paper_researchTwo = T.Teacher_researchOne OR P.Paper_researchTwo = T.Teacher_researchTwo OR P.Paper_researchTwo = T.Teacher_researchThree JOIN student AS S ON P.Paper_stuId = S.Stu_id AND S.Stu_teacherId != T.Teacher_id WHERE (P.Paper_stuId =#{P.Paper_stuId} )
